name: mdclub-openapi
description: MDClub 的 OpenAPI 描述文件
author: zdhxiong

scripts.validate: npm run build && spectral lint -s=operation-operationId-unique dist/openapi.yaml
scripts.mock: npm run build && prism mock dist/openapi.yaml
scripts.build-php-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g php -o dist/php --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-android-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g android -o dist/android --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-dart-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g dart -o dist/dart --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-objc-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g objc -o dist/objc --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-swift4-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g swift4 -o dist/swift4 --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-aurelia-sdk: npm run build && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g typescript-aurelia --additional-properties=modelPropertyNaming=original -o dist/aurelia --skip-validate-spec
